mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_ACCOUNT_LOCK_HISTORY (auth_account_id, locked, reason, occurred_at, operated_by, created_by) VALUES (#{authAccountId}, #{locked}, #{reason}, #{occurredAt}, #{operatedBy}, #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT auth_account_lock_history_id AS authAccountLockHistoryId, auth_account_id AS authAccountId, locked, reason, occurred_at AS occurredAt, operated_by AS operatedBy, created_at AS createdAt, created_by AS createdBy FROM AUTH_ACCOUNT_LOCK_HISTORY WHERE auth_account_id = #{authAccountId} ORDER BY occurred_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
